[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@remirror/core-utils](./core-utils.md) &gt; [Modifier](./core-utils.modifier.md)

## Modifier variable

Shorthand names for common modifier key combinations which should `just` work on Apple and PC.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
Modifier: {
    Primary: (isMac?: boolean | undefined) => "Meta"[] | "Control"[];
    PrimaryShift: (isMac?: boolean | undefined) => ("Meta" | "Shift")[] | ("Control" | "Shift")[];
    PrimaryAlt: (isMac?: boolean | undefined) => ("Alt" | "Meta")[] | ("Alt" | "Control")[];
    Secondary: (isMac?: boolean | undefined) => ("Alt" | "Meta" | "Shift")[] | ("Alt" | "Control" | "Shift")[];
    Access: (isMac?: boolean | undefined) => ("Alt" | "Control")[] | ("Alt" | "Shift")[];
    Ctrl: () => "Control"[];
    Alt: () => "Alt"[];
    CtrlShift: () => ("Control" | "Shift")[];
    Shift: () => "Shift"[];
    ShiftAlt: () => ("Alt" | "Shift")[];
}
```
